jobDescription: What you’ll be doing...Summary Verizon’s Security, Risk, and Compliance group is looking to hire a Lead Data Analyst for its Data Platform and Analysis team. Candidates filling this position should be comfortable acting in a subject matter expert role, working with broad guidance, and conducting independent research and experimentation. A qualified candidate will be fluent in at least one (if not more) programming language(s) used in the data science, data analytics, and/or machine learning discipline. Additionally, the candidate should be competent in observational and inferential statistics, methods, and algorithms. The candidate will work within a technical team as well as across the organization, including with business sponsors and other technology teams. The successful candidate will have a strong drive to explore diverse sets of data, critically analyze the data in the context of key business requirements and deliver valuable guidance to be leveraged by cross-organizational leadership teams.
